text: Iesus nguibar ekiaba ko nguibar doziba ko ruarir nguibaba dar zui. A zuir nguibar kaba me arazir kamram ami, me arɨmariar gumaziba inigha izava nguibamɨn tongɨn da arɨgha, egha me a gakaghora ghaze, a men asughtɨma, arɨmariaba itiba an korotiar avɨzibar suigham. Ezɨ gumazamizir an korotiamɨn suiziba, men arɨmariaba gefi.
